meanings.definition: A person who has renounced the world and taken up a life of asceticism.
meanings.sent1: The sannyasins lived in solitude, away from the distractions of the city.
meanings.sent2: Many sannyasins dedicate their lives to meditation and spiritual growth.
meanings.sent3: The sannyasins decided to have a 'no talking' day, which led to some funny miscommunications.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to living like a sannyasin was as strong as the roots of an ancient tree.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sannyasins meditating under the stars was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Followers of a Hindu religious order who have renounced worldly pursuits.
meanings.sent1: The sannyasins gathered at the temple to offer their prayers.
meanings.sent2: In the ashram, the sannyasins followed the teachings of their spiritual leader.
meanings.sent3: During the festival, the sannyasins surprised everyone by organizing a dance performance.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the sannyasins was as unbreakable as a chain of steel.
meanings.sent5: The colorful robes of the sannyasins brightened up the monastery courtyard.
